name: Ghana Civil Aviation Training Academy (GATA)
about: The Ghana Civil Aviation Training Academy (GATA), established in 2008 by the Ghana Civil Aviation Authority, is a center of excellence in aviation training. GATA provides world-class, competency-based aviation training supported by dedicated and professional specialists. The academy offers a range of courses, including those certified by the International Air Transport Association (IATA), and has forged strategic partnerships with international aviation institutions. GATA is committed to delivering high-quality, accredited training programs and has trained various aviation professionals, including aviation inspectors. With a mission to become the regional leading provider of competency-based aviation training, GATA ensures a supportive and professional environment for all its students. GATA is the ideal choice for those seeking top-tier aviation education in a globally recognized setting.
